verses.verse: You are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> you shall not cut <S%H1413><s%> yourselves, <S%H7760><s%> nor make any baldness <S%H7144><s%> between your eyes <S%H5869><s%> for the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

For you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> you to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for his own possession, <S%H5459><s%> above all peoples <S%H5971><s%> who are on <S%H6440><s%> the face of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> any abominable thing. <S%H8441><s%>
These are the animals <S%H929><s%> which you may eat: <S%H398><s%> the ox, <S%H7794><s%> the sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and the goat, <S%H5795><s%>

the hart, <S%H354><s%> and the gazelle, <S%H6643><s%> and the roebuck, <S%H6643><s%> and the wild goat, <S%H689><s%> and the ibex, <S%H1788><s%> and the antelope, <S%H8377><s%> and the chamois. <S%H2169><s%>

Every animal <S%H929><s%> that parts <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and has the hoof <S%H6541><s%> cloven <S%H8157><s%> in <S%H8156><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and chews <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> among the animals, <S%H929><s%> that may you eat. <S%H398><s%>

Nevertheless these you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or of those who have the <S%H6536><s%> hoof <S%H6541><s%> cloven: <S%H8156><s%> the camel, <S%H1581><s%> and the hare, <S%H768><s%> and the rabbit; <S%H8227><s%> because they chew <S%H5927><s%> the cud <S%H1625><s%> but don't <S%H6536><s%> part the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> they are unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>

The pig, <S%H2386><s%> because it has a split <S%H6536><s%> hoof <S%H6541><s%> but doesn't <S%H1625><s%> chew the cud, is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you: <S%H1320><s%> of their flesh you shall not eat, <S%H398><s%> and their carcasses <S%H5038><s%> you shall not touch. <S%H5060><s%>
These you may eat <S%H398><s%> of all that are in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> whatever has fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> may you eat; <S%H398><s%>
and whatever doesn't <S%H5579><s%> have fins and scales <S%H7193><s%> you shall not eat; <S%H398><s%> it is unclean to you. <S%H2931><s%>
Of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H6833><s%> you may eat. <S%H398><s%>
But these are they of which you shall not eat: <S%H398><s%> the eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and the vulture, <S%H6538><s%> and the osprey, <S%H5822><s%>
and the red kite, <S%H344><s%> and the falcon, <S%H344><s%> and the kite <S%H344><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%>
and every raven <S%H6158><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%>
and the ostrich, <S%H1323><s%> and the owl, <S%H1323><s%> and the seagull, <S%H7828><s%> and the hawk <S%H8464><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%>
the little owl, <S%H3563><s%> and the great owl, <S%H3244><s%> and the horned owl, <S%H8580><s%>
and the pelican, <S%H6893><s%> and the vulture, <S%H7360><s%> and the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%>
and the stork, <S%H2624><s%> and the heron <S%H601><s%> after its kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the hoopoe, <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
All winged <S%H5775><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you: <S%H398><s%> they shall not be eaten.
Of all clean <S%H2889><s%> birds <S%H5775><s%> you may eat. <S%H398><s%>

You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> of anything that dies of itself: <S%H5038><s%> you may give <S%H5414><s%> it to the foreigner <S%H1616><s%> living among you who is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> that he may eat <S%H398><s%> it; <S%H4376><s%> or you may sell it to a foreigner: <S%H5237><s%> for you are a holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not boil <S%H1310><s%> a young goat <S%H1423><s%> in its mother <S%H517><s%>'s milk. <S%H2461><s%>

You shall surely <S%H6237><s%> tithe <S%H6237><s%> all the increase <S%H8393><s%> of your seed, <S%H2233><s%> that which comes forth <S%H3318><s%> from the field <S%H7704><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> by year. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> there, <S%H4643><s%> the tithe of your grain, <S%H1715><s%> of your new wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of your oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of your herd <S%H1241><s%> and of your flock; <S%H6629><s%> that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> always. <S%H3117><s%>

If the way <S%H1870><s%> is too long <S%H7235><s%> for you, <S%H3588><s%> so that you are not able <S%H3201><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it, <S%H4725><s%> because the place is too far <S%H7368><s%> from you, <S%H3068><s%> which Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> to set <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> shall bless you; <S%H1288><s%>

then you shall turn <S%H5414><s%> it into money, <S%H3701><s%> and bind up <S%H6696><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and shall go <S%H1980><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

and you shall bestow <S%H5414><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> for whatever your soul <S%H5315><s%> desires, <S%H183><s%> for cattle, <S%H1241><s%> or for sheep, <S%H6629><s%> or for wine, <S%H3196><s%> or for strong drink, <S%H7941><s%> or for whatever your soul <S%H5315><s%> asks <S%H7592><s%> of you; <S%H398><s%> and you shall eat there before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you shall rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> you and your household. <S%H1004><s%>
The Levite <S%H3881><s%> who is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> you shall not forsake <S%H5800><s%> him; <S%H2506><s%> for he has no portion nor inheritance with you. <S%H5159><s%>

At the end <S%H7097><s%> of every three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> all the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your increase <S%H8393><s%> in the same year, <S%H8141><s%> and shall lay it up <S%H3240><s%> within your gates: <S%H8179><s%>

and the Levite, <S%H3881><s%> because he has no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you, <S%H1616><s%> and the foreigner living among you, <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless, and the widow, <S%H490><s%> who are within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied; <S%H7646><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%> which you do. <S%H6213><s%>
